'''''Lost Adventurer''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[The Chronicles of the Sea of Fog]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete 8 Open World mechanism-activated [[Time Trial Challenge]]s on [[Tsurumi Island]] in Inazuma.
